item.description:
This is the most detailed map of toxic air in the USA: https://t.co/LJC3rWJUUW @ProPublica built it for us using @EPA data. Please help them make it better, so we can all hold our governments accountable for reducing cancer risk. This thread explains how.

item.title: #en @ 1459170690989367303
item.description:
Tomorrow is the first day of Pista ng Mapa 2021! Festivities start at 13:00 GMT+8!
Pista ng Mapa is a free (as in food and as in freedom) conference by the local #foss4g and #openstreetmap communities in the Philippines!
